hero.title: About StepFree: Empowering Lives, Building Connections
hero.description: StepFree is dedicated to breaking down barriers and fostering an inclusive world where disabled individuals have unparalleled access to education, meaningful employment, and vibrant community life. We believe in a future where every step is free from limitation.

missionVision.missionDesc: To provide a comprehensive, accessible platform that connects disabled individuals with vital resources, fostering equal opportunities in education, meaningful employment, and vibrant community engagement, promoting independence and quality of life.
missionVision.visionDesc: To be the leading global resource for accessibility, empowering every disabled person to reach their full potential and live a life without barriers, contributing to a more inclusive and equitable society.

accessibility.title: Accessibility First
accessibility.desc: Ensuring all our resources and platform features are user-friendly, intuitive, and barrier-free for everyone.

community.title: Community & Belonging
community.desc: Fostering a supportive, inclusive network where disabled individuals feel valued, connected, and empowered.

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.desc: Providing tools, knowledge, and opportunities that enable self-determination and personal growth.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: Continuously seeking new and better ways to solve challenges, at the forefront of accessibility through creative solutions and thoughtful design.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.desc: Operating with honesty, transparency, and a deep commitment to the trust placed in us by our community.

growth.title: Growth & Progress
growth.desc: Committed to supporting individuals in achieving their personal and professional aspirations, fostering continuous improvement.

impact.title: Our Commitment to Impact
impact.desc1: StepFree is more than just a platform; it's a movement. We are committed to making a tangible, positive impact in the lives of disabled individuals by fostering an ecosystem of support, opportunity, and advocacy. Our initiatives are designed with a deep understanding of the unique challenges and strengths of our community.
impact.desc2: We partner with leading organizations, educators, and employers to ensure our resources are current, relevant, and effective, continuously expanding our reach and deepening our support for the community.

hero.title: Empowering Minds, Expanding Horizons Through Education
hero.description: Discover a world of learning opportunities tailored for disabled individuals. From online courses to vocational training and inclusive university programs, StepFree connects you with the resources to achieve your educational goals.

courses.title: Accessible Online Courses
courses.text: Discover platforms offering inclusive online courses with features like captions, transcripts, and screen-reader compatibility.

workshops.title: Virtual Workshops & Webinars
workshops.text: Participate in live and recorded workshops designed to be fully accessible for all learners.

library.title: Digital Resource Libraries
library.text: Access a curated collection of e-books, articles, and educational materials in accessible formats.

skills.title: Skills Development Programs
skills.text: Enroll in programs focused on practical skills with adaptive learning environments.

career.title: Career Readiness Training
career.text: Workshops and mentorship to prepare for interviews, resumes, and workplace adjustments.

certification.title: Certification Courses
certification.text: Gain industry-recognized certifications through accessible training pathways.

guides.title: University Accessibility Guides
guides.text: Information on accessibility features, support services, and accommodations at universities.

support.title: Disability Support Services
support.text: Learn about support centers and programs for disabled students on campus.

scholarships.title: Scholarships & Funding
scholarships.text: Find scholarships and financial aid for disabled students pursuing higher education.

hero.description: StepFree connects disabled job seekers with inclusive opportunities and tailored support. Find your next role with employers who value diversity and accessibility.

support.title: Need More Support?
support.description: Our team is here to help you navigate your career journey. Reach out for personalized guidance and support.

gem.title: Grand Egyptian Museum (GEM) — Giza
gem.desc: Modern museum designed with accessibility requirements: pathways, elevators and ramps, exhibition areas with audio/visual aids and designated parking.

nmec.title: National Museum of Egyptian Civilization (NMEC) — Fustat (Cairo)
nmec.desc: Museum equipped with accessibility facilities: elevators, sometimes free wheelchairs, and brochures/materials in alternative formats for visitors with disabilities.

bibalex.title: Bibliotheca Alexandrina — Alexandria
bibalex.desc: Library and cultural center with adapted facilities: elevators, services for the visually impaired (Taha Hussein Library) and excellent internal accessibility.

azhar.title: Al-Azhar Park — Cairo
azhar.desc: Large public park with wide pathways and seating areas, easily accessible from designated entrances (suitable for picnics and light outdoor activities).

tahrir.title: The Egyptian Museum (Tahrir) — Cairo
tahrir.desc: Historic museum with elevators and main corridors partially adapted for wheelchair access (some older areas may be less accessible).

pyramids.title: Pyramids Plateau & Solar Boat Museum — Giza
pyramids.desc: Outdoor area (general views) wheelchair accessible on most new paths, and the Solar Boat Museum has been developed with accessible entrances and ramps.

cfc.title: Cairo Festival City Mall — New Cairo
cfc.desc: Modern shopping center with wide corridors, elevators and adapted parking, often with wheelchair request services available from building management.

moe.title: Mall of Egypt — 6th of October
moe.desc: Large mall equipped with entrances, elevators and public accessibility facilities; very suitable for group visits with internal maps to help navigation.

citystars.title: City Stars Mall — Heliopolis
citystars.desc: Large mall known for spacious areas, elevators and adapted facades to facilitate navigation.

planetarium.title: Bibliotheca Alexandria Planetarium / Science Center — Alexandria
planetarium.desc: Science center affiliated with the library with adapted facilities, comfortable shows and halls equipped for users with disabilities.

nubian.title: Nubian Museum — Aswan
nubian.desc: Modern museum with elevators and adapted corridors, often with accessible services and information for those with special needs.

alex_national.title: Alexandria National Museum
alex_national.desc: Contemporary museum with internal corridors and elevators adapted for easy navigation and visitors with disabilities.

sound_light.title: Sound & Light (Pyramids) — Giza
sound_light.desc: Sound and light show providing designated wheelchair areas in front of the stage; the outdoor viewing area is generally easily accessible.

khan.title: Khan El-Khalili — Cairo
khan.desc: Many main corridors in the market are large and allow navigation (preferable to move through main paths and developed areas).

opera.title: Cairo Opera House
opera.desc: Outdoor areas, plazas and Cairo Opera entrances are adapted and provide suitable access for viewers/visitors on most levels.

gezira.title: Gezira / Fish Garden — Zamalek
gezira.desc: Green spaces and gardens on Zamalek Island with walkways and seating areas relatively adapted for safe and comfortable navigation.
